name: Pineapple Pizza
the-point: Does fruit (specifically pineapple) belong on a pizza?

name: AI Art
the-point: Is art created by AI actually 'art', or is it just a calculation?

name: Cereal Soup
the-point: Is cereal technically a soup?

name: Hot Dog Sandwich
the-point: Is a hot dog a sandwich?

name: Social Media
the-point: Has social media done more harm than good for society?

name: Work Week
the-point: Should the 4-day work week be the global standard?

name: Privacy vs Security
the-point: Is it okay to sacrifice privacy if it guarantees total safety?

name: Simulation Theory
the-point: What is the probability that we are living in a computer simulation?

name: Self-Driving Cars
the-point: If a self-driving car must choose between hitting a pedestrian or the driver, who should it choose?

name: Mars Colonization
the-point: Should we spend billions on Mars or fix Earth first?

name: Book vs Movie
the-point: Can a movie ever truly be better than the book it's based on?

name: School Systems
the-point: Is the current education system obsolete in the age of Google?

name: Veganism
the-point: Will the whole world eventually be forced to go vegan for the planet?

name: Cryogenics
the-point: If you could be frozen and woken up in 200 years, would you do it?

name: Money and Happiness
the-point: Can money actually buy happiness, or just a lack of misery?

name: Genetic Engineering
the-point: Should parents be allowed to choose the traits of their babies?

name: Ghost Belief
the-point: Do ghosts exist, or is it all just unexplained science?

name: Universal Income
the-point: Should every citizen receive a basic income regardless of work?

name: Cancel Culture
the-point: Does 'Cancel Culture' promote accountability or just toxic behavior?

name: Luck vs Hard Work
the-point: Is success 90% hard work or 90% being in the right place at the right time?

name: Zodiac Signs
the-point: Is astrology a fun hobby or a complete scam?

name: Streaming Era
the-point: Was music better when we had to buy physical albums?

name: Public Fame
the-point: Would you rather be world-famous and hated, or completely unknown and loved?

name: E-Sports
the-point: Should competitive gaming be considered a real sport?

name: Lie for Good
the-point: Is it ever truly 'moral' to tell a white lie?
